COMMENTS: Individual unreinforced masonry buildings that caused fatalities: forty-two people died as a result of building failures (other than the Canterbury Television and Pyne Gould Corporation buildings) in the 22 February 2011 earthquake. Walls constructed of solid clay bricks in cement mortar. Roof and floor framing in timber. Most are 1- and 2-storey buildings.

REFERENCE: University of Otago + Cambridge Earthquake Impact Database
